name: Note! Color Mechanica
overview: This disc is an interactive Sega CD rendition of Note!'s chiptune album Color Mechanica. It features glitchy visuals and a sci-fi setting. Presented as a set of interactive light shows, the player is able to control the visuals and overlay extra sounds. With a second controller, two players can interact with the light show at once. In addition, it contains an FMV music video for the track Bearmode Transmission and a variety of extra hidden features. ---------- Seven hard-hitting, lo-bit tracks by Note! are brought to life by the visual wizardy of Batsly Adams in a fully featured audio-visual journey. Experience the color mechanica first hand on SEGA CD. FEATURES -Seven CD quality audio tracks by Note! with mastering by Chris Burke -Seven interactive visuals by Batsly Adams and Note! -Plug in a second controller to expand the fun! -Built-in capability to turn any party into a RAVE -Full Motion Video!!! -Tons of hidden bonus material! INFO! -This disc is intended to be played in a SEGA CD console but is fully playable in your favorite SEGA CD emulator on your modern machine! -The disc also functions normally as an audio CD in any CD player! -Digital audio files are included on the disc release in addition to download NOTE TO EUROPEAN FANSSS! This is an NTSC product! It will not run properly in your Mega CD System (PAL)! However, it will still run perfectly fine in your emulator of choice, assuming you have a US Bios.
